title: Proxeeus - Mechanical Menace
description:
At The Mountains Of Madness is the debut album of French Goa trance producer Jerome Lesterps, better known as Proxeeus. Since his appearance on the Celestial Transvibrations compilation, Neogoa and Proxeeus have been working very hard to introduce his talent in full-length form and deliver this debut album to Goa trance fans around the world. This release also celebrates the 5th anniversary of Neogoa Records, international netlabel day, and the opening of the new Proxeeus website. Inspired by H. P. Lovecraft themes, this album delivers mad and energetic acid-driven Goa trance music with high-octane melodies and grooves. This unusual combination of interesting concepts will bring a listener on a proper journey while reinstating acid vibes into Goa trance in a big way. All tracks written and produced by Jerome Lesterps (France). Artwork design by Richpa at Neogoa Design (Croatia) with mastering by Igor Čeranić at Deimos Soundlabs (Croatia).

01 - Across The Galaxy (149 BPM) 
02 - Hanuman (147 BPM) 
03 - Vimanas (149 BPM) 
04 - Mechanical Menace (147 BPM) 
05 - At The Mountains Of Madness (147 BPM) 
06 - Ayahuasca (149 BPM) 
07 - Chandra Knows (144 BPM) 
08 - The Sea Of Tranquility (100 BPM)

Free download: http://www.neogoa.net/at-the-mountains-of-madness
Proxeeus: http://www.proxeeus.net | http://www.neogoa.net/proxeeus/

For more free Goa trance and ambient music, please visit us:

Website - http://www.neogoa.net
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/neogoarecords
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/neogoarecords
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/neogoarecords
Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/neogoarecords
Google+ - https://google.com/+neogoarecords
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/c/neogoarecords
Bandcamp - https://neogoarecords.bandcamp.com
